column4: guys, with most NASs I am seeing, its max capacity is 4GB ( 4 bays), why is that? im guessing I couldnt swap 4 X1.5TB into it for some reason...
Not sure... I believe it is because there wasn't 1.5Tb drives at the time of release and they have not been tested on the systems...
or it could be a possible BIOS/firmware/software restriction
It is a possibility, but nothing that a BIOS upgrade would not resolve... PROBABLY! :)
